## IEventListener.onEvent() method

Processes an event emitted by the agent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onEvent?(event: {
        type: string;
        data: any;
    }, context: IAgentContext<{}>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                               | Description                                                                       |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event     | { type: string; data: any; }                       |                                                                                   |
| context   | [IAgentContext](./core.iagentcontext.md)&lt;{}&gt; | Execution context. Requires agent with [IDataStore](./core.idatastore.md) methods |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
